comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract includes one or more amendments.This contract is a multi-year contract.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department To conduct an Analytical Review and Fraud Risk Assessment over change orders approved by the Parliamentary Precinct Branch in relation to the West Block Rehabilitation Project.
